content.content: I need a black Adidas T-shirt. Please buy one if its rating is higher than 4.5.

```python
product_name = "Adidas T-shirt"
brand = "Adidas"
rating_min = 4.5
category = "Clothing"

# Search for black Adidas T-shirt with a rating higher than 4.5
product_search_results = search_product(product_name=product_name, brand=brand, rating_min=rating_min, category=category)

# Extract the product IDs that match the criteria
product_ids = list(product_search_results.keys())

if not product_ids:
    raise ValueError("No products found matching the criteria.")

# Proceed to checkout with the found products
checkout_result = checkout_selected_cart(product_ids, discount_code=None)
print(checkout_result)
```

Running the code gave the following error:

Traceback (most recent call last):
File "<stdin>", line 7, in <module>
